channel.title: GitHub on Raphael Borges
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub on Raphael Borges

item.title: Have you heard about Digestabot?
item.description: I composed this blog post shortly after the release of Digestabot, a new tool from Chainguard, to discuss how to use and the purpose of each feature. Providing detailed instructions on implementing this GitHub Action in your repository. You can read the full blog post or the PT-BR version here on dev.to.
